body_html:
@girving: Yes, i have left them in the last code cell. Thought that muwas written there intentionally to distinguish manual calculations of weights update. And later, at the bottom text cell there are references to mu too. And I understand that in text and formulas mu looks more compact then learning_rate.

If you think that it is better to replace mu with learning_rate there too, I will do it.

body:
@girving: Yes, i have left them in the last code cell. Thought that `mu`was written there intentionally to distinguish manual calculations of weights update. And later, at the bottom text cell there are references to `mu` too. And I understand that in text and formulas `mu` looks more compact then `learning_rate.`

If you think that it is better to replace `mu` with `learning_rate` there too, I will do it.
